TopicTitle: New Kerbalnaut from Spain and also question

Articles.Content:
Greetings

I'm from Spain and I've been playing for a couple of weeks at a friends place and I finally decided to buy my own copy of KSP!

I'm so excited! So far all I have achieved is maintain orbit consistently, get to the mun and back and also land on the second kerbal moon (can't rememebr the name, the tiny tiny one). I also managed to dock without addons and I built a small space station (although makes refueling so so hard..).

Being a physics buff , I find the physics in KSP fascinating and allows us peons to experience a (although simulated) exciting and affordable space program

My Kudos go to the developers which I wanted to fund buying a copy. I'm looking forward seeing this game finished.

Question in the new patch (0.21.1) I noticed you can get to choose your crew. Do Courage and Stupidity affect the mission or how the kerbal behaves in EVA in any way?

Also, I tried to setup an avatar and a signature but I haven't found the option anywehre, how can I do this?

Thanks in advance and thanks for reading

Question in the new patch (0.21.1) I noticed you can get to choose your crew. Do Courage and Stupidity affect the mission or how the kerbal behaves in EVA in any way?

At this time, it only affects the kerbal's expression. They may have more effect when we can start training the kerbals to do more than go along for the ride.

Also, I tried to setup an avatar and a signature but I haven't found the option anywehre, how can I do this?

You need to have four or five (not sure which, I've heard both) approved posts before you can do that.

Glad to see a well moderated game forum so it doesn't get out of hand (unlike other communities).

The more I get into it the more I like the indie way.
